Class DexpiMetadata

java.lang.Object
neqsim.process.processmodel.dexpi.DexpiMetadata
public final class DexpiMetadata extends Object
Shared constants describing the recommended DEXPI metadata handled by the reader and writer.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    DEFAULT_FLOW_UNIT
